faqs.question: How do I improve AI model accuracy?
faqs.answer: Improving AI model accuracy involves several steps: ensuring high-quality and diverse training data, selecting the right model architecture, and fine-tuning hyperparameters like learning rate and batch size. Regular evaluation on a validation set is also crucial.

faqs.question: What is the difference between supervised and unsupervised learning?
faqs.answer: Supervised learning uses labeled data to train a model, meaning each data point is tagged with a correct output. Unsupervised learning, on the other hand, works with unlabeled data to find hidden patterns or intrinsic structures.

faqs.question: How can I reset my password?
faqs.answer: To reset your password, go to the login page and click the 'Forgot Password' link. You will receive an email with instructions on how to create a new password for your account.
